structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Purpose of thermal vision grant program.
law.text:
The thermal vision grant program, which is administered pursuant to KRS 95A.400 to 95A.440 and appropriations for the thermal vision grant program in the state budget, is designed to:
Reduce and prevent the loss of life by creating better equipped firefighters throughout the Commonwealth; and
Upgrade the capabilities of local firefighters by providing financial assistance to be used to purchase thermal vision devices.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002.
